name: Home - Introduction
headline: Hi, I’m Alexis. Nice to meet you.
text:
I’m a front-end web developer currently living in Portland, OR. I’ve been playing with the web since 1996, and have worked professionally for over 15 years. I’ve developed sites and apps for a variety of companies and organizations—large and small—and now am focusing on building and architecting component libraries, design systems, and writing modern, standards-based code.

Tim Berners-Lee proposed the idea of the World Wide Web on my 6th birthday, so I like to think it was meant to be.
